DOC.brief_title: Exercise Study Patients With Lung Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: In open , prospective , single center study 40 patient ( pt ) NSCLC undergo adjuvant palliative chemo-/ radiotherapy enrol . Physical status assess use 6 Minute Walk Test ( 6MWT ) endurance use Handheld Dynamometer ( HHDM ) strength ( flexion extension elbow , hip knee ) . Psychological performance measure standardized questionnaire ( MFI , FACT-L , PHQ - 9 ) . Data collect baseline ( T0 ) 8 week sport intervention ( T1 ) . Pts instruct train least 5 times/ week inpatient setting . After discharge pt instruct train home-based setting least 3 times/week period 8 week . Feasibility define adherence two training per week least 6 week ( 8 week intervention ) .
